thread.section_title: Rush Order Tees Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rush Order Tees | rushordertees.com
thread.title: Nikki Cecil
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Nikki Cecil

author: Nikki Cecil
title: Nikki Cecil
text: I think I was just so excited that I found a website where I could design everything myself, that I rushed through it and wasn't happy with what I confirmed. I called the office and got everything changed and taken care of so quickly and smoothly. I will use this site for all of my t shirt needs from here on out, and will recommend them to everybody! You guys rock! Thank you.
